body:
A chart with only CRDs fails to install, and if running with `--debug`, also panics.

Output of `helm version`:
```
version.BuildInfo{Version:"v3.0.3", GitCommit:"ac925eb7279f4a6955df663a0128044a8a6b7593", GitTreeState:"clean", GoVersion:"go1.13.6"}
```

Output of `kubectl version`:
```
Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"14", GitVersion:"v1.14.2", GitCommit:"66049e3b21efe110454d67df4fa62b08ea79a19b", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-05-16T16:23:09Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"14+", GitVersion:"v1.14.10-gke.17", GitCommit:"bdceba0734835c6cb1acbd1c447caf17d8613b44", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2020-01-17T23:10:13Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.12b4", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
```

Cloud Provider/Platform (AKS, GKE, Minikube etc.): 
GKE

Installation/deletion:
```
$ helm install crd-test . --debug
install.go:149: [debug] Original chart version: ""
install.go:166: [debug] CHART PATH: <redacted>

client.go:88: [debug] creating 1 resource(s)
client.go:88: [debug] creating 1 resource(s)
client.go:88: [debug] creating 1 resource(s)
client.go:88: [debug] creating 1 resource(s)
client.go:88: [debug] creating 1 resource(s)
install.go:139: [debug] Clearing discovery cache
wait.go:51: [debug] beginning wait for 5 resources with timeout of 1m0s
client.go:88: [debug] creating 0 resource(s)
Error: no objects visited
helm.go:75: [debug] no objects visited
helm.sh/helm/v3/pkg/kube.init
        /home/circleci/helm.sh/helm/pkg/kube/client.go:50
runtime.doInit
        /usr/local/go/src/runtime/proc.go:5222
runtime.doInit
        /usr/local/go/src/runtime/proc.go:5217
runtime.doInit
        /usr/local/go/src/runtime/proc.go:5217
runtime.main
        /usr/local/go/src/runtime/proc.go:190
runtime.goexit
        /usr/local/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1357
```

If I then delete the release, same:
```
$ helm delete crd-test --debug
uninstall.go:91: [debug] uninstall: Deleting crd-test
uninstall.go:124: [debug] purge requested for crd-test
Error: uninstallation completed with 1 error(s): object not found, skipping delete
helm.go:75: [debug] uninstallation completed with 1 error(s): object not found, skipping delete
helm.sh/helm/v3/pkg/action.(*Uninstall).Run
        /home/circleci/helm.sh/helm/pkg/action/uninstall.go:132
main.newUninstallCmd.func1
        /home/circleci/helm.sh/helm/cmd/helm/uninstall.go:53
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).execute
        /go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v0.0.5/command.go:826
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteC
        /go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v0.0.5/command.go:914
github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).Execute
        /go/pkg/mod/github.com/spf13/cobra@v0.0.5/command.go:864
main.main
        /home/circleci/helm.sh/helm/cmd/helm/helm.go:74
runtime.main
        /usr/local/go/src/runtime/proc.go:203
runtime.goexit
        /usr/local/go/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:1357
```

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: bug

labels.description: Issues and Pull Requests related to the major version v3
labels.name: v3.x

title: Error/panic when installing/deleting chart with only CRDs
